locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022

relationships.description: Email communication discussing political developments and market reactions
Epstein appears to have made accurate predictions about Trump's election chances

analysis.purpose: To acknowledge Epstein's accurate prediction about Trump's election victory and discuss market reactions
analysis.significance: Shows communication between Epstein and business associate about 2016 election results, indicating Epstein had political insights and was monitoring the election closely

notable_quotes: Shocked but you seem to be right on don't count him out.
Trump victory looking good and these pollsters like fools...
red_flags: High importance flag on political discussion

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein expressing surprise that Epstein's prediction about Trump's election victory appears to be correct, noting pollsters were wrong and markets were reacting negatively with Dow futures down 700 points.
